recipes.title: Afia Cooks Waakye!
recipes.intro: Afia and Uncle Kofi are making waakye for a busy market morning.
recipes.introFact: Waakye is a popular Ghana meal made with rice and beans.
recipes.completionMessage: Amazing! Your waakye bowl is ready to serve.
recipes.completionFact: Waakye is often enjoyed for breakfast and lunch.

steps.story: Tap to rinse the rice and beans.
steps.fact: Clean grains make the meal taste fresh.

steps.story: Tap to chop onions and tomatoes.
steps.fact: Colorful veggies add flavor and color.

steps.story: Drag the oil bottle into the pot.
steps.fact: A little oil helps ingredients cook smoothly.

steps.story: Drag the rice and beans into the pot.
steps.fact: Waakye mixes rice and beans together.

steps.story: Tap the spice shaker to season it.
steps.fact: Families use different spices for their waakye.

steps.story: Hold the lid gently while it cooks.
steps.fact: Hot steam means your waakye is almost done.
